CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 16, 1950, pg. 2, reads: "Pitt Summer Commencement - Numerous Negro students were among the persons graduating or receiving degrees at eh University of Pittsburgh's summer commencement held in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall last Friday evening. Among them were...Bottom left: Helen Lee, Werner L. Jordan and Lucille Stewart received master's degrees in education... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of University of Pittsburgh graduates Helen Lee, Werner L. Jordan, and Lucille Stewart, posed in hallway of Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall
